law.text: On application by or for a partner, the Circuit Court for the county in which the certificate of limited partnership is recorded may order dissolution of a limited partnership if it is not reasonably practicable to carry on the business in conformity with the partnership agreement.
law.history: Repeal the prior repeal contained in 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 239, which was to have been effective January 1, 2008, 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 137, sec. 180, effective June 26, 2007. -- Repealed 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 239, effective January 1, 2008. -- Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 284, sec. 45, effective July 15, 1988.
